main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a small yellowish-green object moving slowly in Beaver Falls, Pennsylvania on July 8, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as round and small,Observation lasted about 50 seconds,The speed of the object was reported as slow and southwestward,The sighting was made using binoculars during dusk,The report suggests the possibility of an unidentified aerial craft but lacks sufficient data for evaluation.
